trans-unit.source: Configures an HTTP module for a Web application.
trans-unit.target: 配置 Web 应用程序的 HTTP 模块。

trans-unit.source: The HttpModulesSection class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `httpModules` section of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: HttpModulesSection 类使您能够以编程方式访问和修改`httpModules`配置文件节。

trans-unit.source: This type is part of a group that includes the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleAction> and the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleActionCollection> types.
trans-unit.target: 此类型是包括的组的一部分<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleAction>和<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleActionCollection>类型。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleActionCollection> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleAction>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The HttpModulesSection can read and write information from and to the related section of the configuration file according to the section property <xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A> whose value is <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> HttpModulesSection 可以读取和写入信息 from 和 to 部分属性，<xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A>其值为<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition>。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition></xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A>根据配置文件的相关部分

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpModulesSection"></xref> class.
The HttpModulesSection constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: HttpModulesSection 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: 它是由 ASP.NET 配置系统调用的。

trans-unit.source: You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModulesSection> class by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> method.

Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleActionCollection"></xref> of <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleAction"></xref> modules contained by the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpModulesSection"></xref>.
The collection returned by this method does not refer to any actual element in the underlying configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回的集合不是基础的配置文件中任何实际元素指。

trans-unit.source: It is an ASP.NET infrastructure construct that allows easy access to the modules it contains.
trans-unit.target: 它是 ASP.NET 基础结构构造，它包含的模块的方便访问。

trans-unit.source: This is a common pattern for handling the elements of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 这是一种常见模式，用于处理配置文件的元素。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleActionCollection"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleAction"></xref> objects, or modules, defined by the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpModulesSection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleActionCollection"> </xref>包含<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleAction"></xref>对象或模块，通过定义<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpModulesSection"> </xref>。
